price: 41. Y quienes se defiendan ante una injusticia no serán castigados por ello.
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
